content: Generate a sentence with each word starting from the last letter of the alphabet and going in reverse order.

Zoologists yearly xenophobic whales vigorously x-ray unstable tigers, scrutinizing them rigorously. Quarrelsome pandas quarrel publicly, often negligently misbehaving loudly, knavishly jabbing ignorant hippos greedily. Frequently, elephants dutifully charge boldly, awkwardly bypassing zebras. Youths viciously undermine tamed squirrels, ruthlessly squashing tiny rabbits. Quarrelsome pandas quarrel publicly, often negligently misbehaving loudly, knavishly jabbing ignorant hippos greedily. Frequently, elephants dutifully charge boldly, awkwardly bypassing zebras. Youths viciously undermine tamed squirrels, ruthlessly squashing tiny rabbits.
